ability_description.SOFT_BOILED: Cures all status effects and grants [20,40,80,SP] SHIELD to every allied Pokémon
ability_description.EARTHQUAKE: Deal [120,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the same column as the user
ability_description.SONG_OF_DESIRE: The target is CHARM for [6,SP] seconds
ability_description.CONFUSING_MIND: The target is CONFUSION for [6,SP] seconds
ability_description.KING_SHIELD: PROTECT the user for 1.5 seconds, gain [10,20,30,SP] SHIELD and swap positions with the farthest enemy Pokémon
ability_description.EXPLOSION: Deal [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemies. Damages the user
ability_description.NIGHTMARE: POISON all enemy Pokémon for [2,4,8,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.CLANGOROUS_SOUL: Buff adjacent allied Pokémon's ATK by [2,4,8] and DEF / SPE_DEF by [1,2,4]
ability_description.BONEMERANG: Throw a bone like a boomerang through the enemy team, dealing [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL to every enemy Pokémon it hits
ability_description.GROWL: Apply the WOUND status to all enemy Pokémon for [3,6,9,SP] seconds
ability_description.RELIC_SONG: Emits a note. After the third note, SLEEP the whole enemy team for [2,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.DISARMING_VOICE: Give [10,20,40,SP=0.5] PP to all allied Pokémon, except the user
ability_description.HIGH_JUMP_KICK: Deal [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL and steal all PP from the target
ability_description.GRASS_WHISTLE: Make [1,2,4] enemy Pokémon SLEEP for 2 seconds
ability_description.TRI_ATTACK: Deal [30,50,70,SP] SPECIAL. Can either BURN, FREEZE or PARALYSIS the target
ability_description.ECHO: Deal [3,6,9,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon. Every time the user uses this ability, the damage increases by [3,6,9,SP]
ability_description.HYPER_VOICE: Deal [50,100,200,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon in the same column as the user and make them CONFUSION for [1,2,3] seconds
ability_description.SHADOW_CLONE: The user creates an identical clone of themselves next to their target. The clone has the same items and stats as the user, has 80% of its max HP and [30,SP] SHIELD
ability_description.VOLT_SWITCH: Dash into the enemy team's backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon hit
ability_description.LIQUIDATION: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and lower the target's DEF by [1,2,4]
ability_description.BURN: BURN all enemy Pokémon for [5,10,20] seconds
ability_description.POISON: Apply POISON to the [1,2,3] closest enemy Pokémon for [3,6,9,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.SLEEP: Make [1,2,3] enemy Pokémon in the backline SLEEP for [2,SP] seconds
ability_description.SILENCE: SILENCE all enemy Pokémon for [2,4,8] seconds
ability_description.PROTECT: PROTECT the user, becoming invulnerable for [5,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.BLIZZARD: FREEZE all enemy Pokémon for [1,2,3] seconds and deal [5,10,15,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage if enemy is already FREEZE
ability_description.CONFUSION: CONFUSION the target for [3,5,7] seconds. If the target is already CONFUSION, deal [75,150,300,SP] SPECIAL instead
ability_description.FIRE_BLAST: Shoot a Fire Blast, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target
ability_description.WHEEL_OF_FIRE: Shoot a returning Flame Wheel, dealing [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon hit
ability_description.SEISMIC_TOSS: Deal [7,14,28,SP] TRUE to the target, multiplied by the number of Pokémon in your team
ability_description.GUILLOTINE: Deal [1,2,3,SP] x ATK SPECIAL to the target. Restore half the user's PP if the target is KO'd
ability_description.ROCK_SLIDE: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target. If the target is a Flying Pokémon, the damage is doubled
ability_description.HEAT_WAVE: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon behind the target
ability_description.HYDRO_PUMP: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon behind the target
ability_description.DRACO_METEOR: Deal [50,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon
ability_description.DEFENSE_CURL: Buff the user's DEF and SPE_DEF by [3,6,12,SP]
ability_description.IRON_DEFENSE: Give [10,20,50,SP] SHIELD to allies on the same row
ability_description.SOAK: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and restore 10 PP to all allied Pokémon
ability_description.ORIGIN_PULSE: A wave travels horizontally across the battlefield dealing [120,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon hit
ability_description.SEED_FLARE: Shaymin's body emits a shockwave, dealing [30,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon, and decreasing their SPE_DEF by 2
ability_description.IRON_TAIL: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and buff the user's DEF by [1,3,5]
ability_description.BLAST_BURN: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL in an area around the user
ability_description.CHARGE: Buff all allied ELECTRIC Pokémon's ATK and ATK_SPEED by [20,SP]%
ability_description.DISCHARGE: Deal [25,50,75,SP] SPECIAL to nearby enemy Pokémon and make them PARALYSIS for 5 seconds
ability_description.BITE: Deal [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and heal the user for 30% of the damage dealt
ability_description.DRAGON_TAIL: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and buff the user's DEF and SPE_DEF by [1,2,3,SP]
ability_description.DRAGON_BREATH: Deal [25,50,100,SP] TRUE to all enemy Pokémon behind the target
ability_description.ICICLE_CRASH: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL in an area around the target
ability_description.ROOT: Heal all nearby allied Pokémon by [20,40,80,SP] HP
ability_description.STOMP: Deal SPECIAL equal to [3,4,5,SP] x ATK to the target
ability_description.PAYBACK: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and heal the user for the same amount
ability_description.NIGHT_SLASH: Deal [40,60,100,SP] SPECIAL to the target, and decrease the DEF of all enemy Pokémon by 1
ability_description.BUG_BUZZ: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target. If the target is PARALYSIS, the damage is doubled
ability_description.STRING_SHOT: Deal [10,20,50,SP] SPECIAL to the target and make them PARALYSIS for 5 seconds
ability_description.VENOSHOCK: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target. If the target is POISON, the damage is doubled
ability_description.LEECH_LIFE: Deal [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL in an area around the user and heal the user for the amount of damage dealt
ability_description.HAPPY_HOUR: Buff all allied Pokémon's ATK by [2,5,8,SP]
ability_description.TELEPORT: Teleport the user to a corner of the battlefield. The user's next attack deals [15,30,60,SP] extra SPECIAL
ability_description.THIEF: Steal as many of the target's items as the user can carry and deal [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.STUN_SPORE: Deals [5,10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL and inflicts PARALYSIS for 5 seconds to adjacent enemies
ability_description.METEOR_MASH: Deal [30,50,70,SP] SPECIAL in an area around the target. Buff the user's ATK by [5,SP]
ability_description.HURRICANE: Deal [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon behind the target and make them PARALYSIS for 4 seconds
ability_description.HEAL_BLOCK: Apply WOUND to all adjacent enemy Pokémon for [5,10,15] seconds
ability_description.ROAR_OF_TIME: Give RESURECTION and [20,SP]% ATK_SPEED to your strongest ally (most items > most stars > most rare)
ability_description.ROCK_TOMB: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and decrease their ATK_SPEED by [10,20,40]%
ability_description.ROCK_SMASH: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and SILENCE them for [3,6,9] seconds
ability_description.HEAD_SMASH: The user hurts itself for [5,10,15,SP] HP and deals [40,80,150,SP] SPECIAL to the target. Execute the target if they are SLEEP or FREEZE
ability_description.CORRUPTED_NATURE: WOUND adjacent enemy Pokémon for 5 seconds and deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to them. Restores HP for the amount of damage dealt
ability_description.CRABHAMMER: Deal [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target with a high chance to deal a critical hit. Execute the target if they are below 30% HP
ability_description.DIAMOND_STORM: Deal [200,SP]% of the user's DEF as SPECIAL to all adjacent enemy Pokémon
ability_description.DRACO_ENERGY: Deal [100,SP]% of the user's HP as SPECIAL to the target
ability_description.DYNAMAX_CANNON: Shoot a Dynamax beam in a straight line. Enemy Pokémon hit take [50,SP]% of their max HP as SPECIAL
ability_description.DYNAMIC_PUNCH: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and make them CONFUSION for [1.5,3,6] seconds
ability_description.ELECTRO_BOOST: All allied ELECTRIC Pokémon receive RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
ability_description.ELECTRO_WEB: Steal [15,30,60,SP]% ATK_SPEED from all adjacent enemy Pokémon
ability_description.FIRE_TRICK: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and teleport them to a corner of the battlefield
ability_description.FLAME_CHARGE: Dash into the enemy team's backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to all enemy Pokémon hit
ability_description.LEECH_SEED: POISON the target for [3,6,12] seconds and heal the user's HP by [20,40,80,SP]
ability_description.LOCK_ON: Lock on the target, applying ARMOR_REDUCTION to them for [3,SP] seconds
ability_description.PSYCH_UP: Deal [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL to the target, then SILENCE them and all adjacent enemy Pokémon for [2,4,8]
ability_description.RAZOR_WIND: Deal [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target, then make them and all adjacent enemy Pokémon PARALYSIS for 7s
ability_description.TWISTING_NETHER: Deals [80,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemy Pokémon, then teleport them randomly across the battlefield
ability_description.WONDER_GUARD: Deal [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to all adjacent enemy Pokémon and make them PARALYSIS for 3 seconds
ability_description.ELECTRIC_SURGE: Buff the ATK_SPEED of all ELECTRIC pokemons by [10,SP]%
ability_description.PSYCHIC_SURGE: Increase AP of all PSYCHIC pokemons by [5,SP]%, except the caster
ability_description.MIND_BLOWN: Deals [50,SP] % of target current HP as SPECIAL
ability_description.PAYDAY: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL. If the target is KO, the player receive [1,2,3] gold
ability_description.BLUE_FLARE: Inflicts [50,SP] SPECIAL + 20 per stage of FIRE synergy
ability_description.FUSION_BOLT: Inflicts [50,SP] SPECIAL + 40 per stage of ELECTRIC synergy
ability_description.AURORA_VEIL: All allies receive [5,10,15,SP] SHIELD and RUNE_PROTECT for 3 seconds
ability_description.AQUA_JET: Dash into the enemy backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.JUDGEMENT: Inflicts [10,SP] special damage to the target, multiplied by the sum of Arceus synergy levels
ability_description.CHATTER: Deal [10,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies. Every enemy has [30,SP]% chance to be CONFUSION for 1 second
ability_description.STEAM_ERUPTION: Deals [80,SP] SPECIAL to the target and all enemies adjacent, and BURN them for 3 seconds
ability_description.APPLE_ACID: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target, and lower its DEF and SPE_DEF by 3 points
ability_description.SHADOW_BALL: Deals [45,90,180,SP] SPECIAL and burn 15 PP to the target and adjacent enemies
ability_description.DIVE: Dives underwater and reappears in the middle of the enemy team, dealing [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL and FREEZE all adjacent units for 1.5 second
ability_description.SPIKE_ARMOR: For [3,5,10] seconds, targets that melee attack this Pokémon receive WOUND and take SPECIAL equal to [100,SP]% of current DEF
ability_description.FAKE_TEARS: Deals [3,6,9,SP] SPECIAL to the whole enemy team and trigger ARMOR_REDUCTION for 3s
ability_description.SPARKLING_ARIA: Deals [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL to the target and adjacent enemies. If adjacent allies are BURN, the burn is healed.
ability_description.DRAGON_DARTS: Throws 3 darts that deals [10,25,50,SP] SPECIAL each to the target. If the target dies, regain 40 PP.
ability_description.GRASSY_SURGE: Increase ATK of all GRASS pokemons by [5,SP]
ability_description.SKY_ATTACK: Rises in the air and fall on the farthest target, PROTECT the attacker for .5 second and deals [120,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.ILLUSION: User recovers [30,50,70,SP=0.5] HP points and copies the form as well as the ATK,DEF, SPE_DEF, and RANGE of the targeted Pokemon
ability_description.SLUDGE: Throws trash onto the 3 squares in front, which inflicts [2,3,4] stacks of POISON for [3,SP] seconds
ability_description.SMOG: Projects a cloud of stinking gas onto 3 tiles in front, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL. Gas stays on board until the end of the fight and reduce the accuracy of pokemons inside by 50%.
ability_description.AURORA_BEAM: Fires a beam in a line. All targets hit take [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and can be FREEZE (chance based on current ice synergy)
ability_description.SPIRIT_SHACKLE: Shoots a Piercing Arrow that deals [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL in a line behind the target and applies WOUND for 4 seconds to everyone hit
ability_description.WATER_SHURIKEN: Throws 3 shuriken in 3 directions that pass through enemies and inflict [20,40,60,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.SHADOW_SNEAK: Deals [50,SP] SPECIAL. If the target is SILENCE, deals TRUE
ability_description.MACH_PUNCH: Deals [50,SP] SPECIAL and attacks immediately after
ability_description.UPPERCUT: Deals [60,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage if attacker has a better DEF than target
ability_description.TRIPLE_KICK: Deals [50,SP] SPECIAL to up to 3 adjacent enemies
ability_description.MAWASHI_GERI: Deals [60,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage if attacker has a better ATK than target
ability_description.FORECAST:
Gives [10,SP] SHIELD to your team, plus additional bonus depending on the weather: 
 Sun: also gives [3,SP] ATK 
 Rain: also gives [20,SP] PP 
 Snow: also gives [2,SP] DEF / SPE_DEF
ability_description.SPECTRAL_THIEF: Disappears and reappears dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL, stealing all the statistic boost of the target
ability_description.DEATH_WING: Deals [150,SP] SPECIAL and heals for 75% of the damage taken by the target
ability_description.SLACK_OFF: Clear all negative status, heal [30,40,50,SP=0.5] % of max HP and put the caster SLEEP for 5 seconds
ability_description.DARK_VOID: Deals [30,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies. If any affected target was SILENCE, they are put SLEEP for 2 seconds
ability_description.OVERHEAT: Deals [40,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies. +30% damage if target is BURN
ability_description.HYPNOSIS: Put SLEEP 1 enemy in the back lines for [2,3.5,6,SP=0.5] seconds
ability_description.MIMIC: Copies the ability of the current target
ability_description.HEX: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to the target. Doubles damage if target is BURN, CONFUSION, FREEZE, PARALYSIS, POISON, SILENCE, SLEEP or WOUND
ability_description.GROWTH: Increase body size and ATK by [10,SP]. Grows twice as fast if weather is SUN
ability_description.HEAL_ORDER: Deals [25,45,65,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies and heal [25,45,65,SP] to adjacent allies
ability_description.SHELL_TRAP: SILENCE target for 3 seconds and removes [40,SP] PP from target and enemies around it
ability_description.DIG: Digs underground and reappears next to the farthest enemy, dealing [10,20,40,SP] special damage to all enemies on the way
ability_description.FIRE_SPIN: Area of effect attack that deals [20,40,100,SP] SPECIAL around the target and BURN all enemies hit for 3 seconds
ability_description.SEARING_SHOT: An inferno of scarlet flames torches everything around the user. Deals [40,SP] SPECIAL and BURN for 3 seconds all enemies within 2 tiles of Victini.
ability_description.SPLASH: Just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...
ability_description.COUNTER: Pokemon lashes out at adjacent enemies dealing [100,SP]% of its missing HP as SPECIAL
ability_description.STICKY_WEB: Deals [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL and PARALYSIS the target and adjacent enemies for 4 seconds
ability_description.SILVER_WIND: Dash into the enemy backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to every enemy on the path. Then gain 1 ATK, 1 DEF, 1 SPE_DEF, 10% AP and 10% ATK_SPEED
ability_description.POISON_POWDER: Dash into the enemy backline, dealing [30,60,120,SP] and applying POISON for 5 seconds to every enemy on the path
ability_description.ICY_WIND: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and decrease target ATK_SPEED by [10,20,40]%
ability_description.GIGATON_HAMMER: Deals [100,200,400,SP] SPECIAL but SILENCE itself for 6 seconds
ability_description.ACROBATICS: Deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage if caster has no held items.
ability_description.ABSORB: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and heals [3,6,12,SP] to adjacent allies
ability_description.ROLLOUT: Buff the DEF by [5,SP] and deals 5x the DEF as SPECIAL
ability_description.THRASH: Buff ATK by [100,SP]% and become CONFUSION for 3 seconds
ability_description.SOLAR_BEAM: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL in a straight line behind the target. If the weather is SUN, targets are BURN for 3 seconds and restores 40 PP
ability_description.MAGMA_STORM: The target becomes trapped within a maelstrom of fire that deals [80,SP] SPECIAL before moving to an adjacent target
ability_description.SLASHING_CLAW: Deals [15,30,60,SP] to the target and WOUND it for 5 seconds. If the target is already WOUND, deals 30% bonus SPECIAL
ability_description.ERUPTION: Fires [20,30,40] projectiles in the air. Every projectile deals [30,50,100,SP] SPECIAL and BURN for 5 seconds
ability_description.LUSTER_PURGE: Launches a ball of light in a straight line that deals [25,SP] SPECIAL twice and lowers twice the SPE_DEF of all enemies hit by 1
ability_description.MIST_BALL: Launches a mist bubble in a straight line that deals [25,SP] SPECIAL twice and lowers twice the AP of all enemies hit by 10%
ability_description.LINK_CABLE: Dash into a new spot, then triggers an electric arc between Plusle and Minun that deals [50,SP] SPECIAL. If Plusle or Minun are alone, deals this damage to adjacent enemies instead.
ability_description.MAGIC_BOUNCE: For [3,6,12] seconds, whenever this pokemon is hit by an ability, the caster is SILENCE for 4 seconds and take SPECIAL equal to [100,SP]% of this pokemon current SPE_DEF
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_A: Spawn 4 Abra at every corner of the board
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_B: BURN the opponent team for 30 seconds
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_C: Give AMULET_COIN to your whole team. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_D: Get a Ditto on your bench
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_E: Get a Pokemon Egg on your bench. It hatches in the next stage
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_F: Fish 2 random WATER Pokemon at max fishing level
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_H: Heal your team to Max HP
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_K: Spawn Hitmonlee with a RED_ORB and max PP
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_L: Give MAX_REVIVE to your whole team. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_M: Your whole team gets max PP
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_O: Give ORAN_BERRY to your whole team. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_P: Spawn 5 random BUG pokemon at their first stage of evolution
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Q: Immediately ends the fight with a draw
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_R: Spawn Geodude, Graveler and Golem with Rocky Helmets
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_S: FREEZE the opponent team for 4 seconds
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_U: Spawn Uxie with AQUA_EGG and max PP
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_V: Cast $t(ability.THUNDER) on all the enemy team
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_W: Get a high rarity pokemon matching your top synergy
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_X: Gives XRAY_VISION to your whole team. The item is removed at the end of the fight.
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_Z: Put the enemy team SLEEP for 5 seconds
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_QM: Get 4 random Unown on your bench
ability_description.HIDDEN_POWER_EM: Spawn 4 random Unown at every corner of the board
ability_description.POISON_JAB: Deals [30,60,90,120,SP] SPECIAL, swaps places with the target, and POISON both the target and the caster for 4 seconds
ability_description.SHELL_SMASH: Deals [15,30,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies; gain 2 ATK, 20% AP and 20% ATK_SPEED, and lose 1 DEF, 1 SPE_DEF
ability_description.HELPING_HAND: Double the damage of the next spell casted by the nearest [2,4,6] allies
ability_description.ASTRAL_BARRAGE: Sends [3,SP=2] small ghosts at random opposing Pokémon. Each of them deals 20 SPECIAL
ability_description.PYRO_BALL: The user attacks by igniting a small stone and launching it as a fiery ball at the farthest target, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL and BURN for 2s everything on its way
ability_description.WHIRLPOOL: Lock on to the farthest enemy and unleash a hail of 4 whirlpools toward them. Each deals [125,SP]% ATK PHYSICAL to the first ennemy hit
ability_description.SMOKE_SCREEN: Channel undergound and reappears in the middle of the enemy team, dealing [10,20,40,SP] SPECIAL, BURN and ARMOR_REDUCTION all adjacent units for 2 second
ability_description.PRESENT: Either deals [80,SP], [150,SP], [300,SP] SPECIAL, or heal 80 HP of the target
ability_description.LEAF_BLADE: Next attack is a guaranteed critical hit dealing [100,SP]% of ATK as SPECIAL
ability_description.ANCHOR_SHOT: Grab the farthest pokémon and deals [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.PSYCHIC: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force, dealing [40,80,120,SP] SPECIAL to it while also lowering their SPE_DEF by [1,2,3,SP]
ability_description.MAGNET_RISE: Grants PROTECT to [2,4,6] adjacent ally pokémon for 2 seconds
ability_description.ATTRACT: Make [1,2,3] pokémon chosen randomly CHARM for [2.5,SP] seconds
ability_description.WATER_PULSE: Deals [50,100,150,SP] SPECIAL to the target and adjacent ennemis and make them CONFUSION for 2 seconds
ability_description.PLAY_ROUGH: Deals [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL to the target and make it CHARM for 2.5 seconds
ability_description.PARABOLIC_CHARGE: Heal [25,50] and deals [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL damage to the target. Excess HP is converted into SPECIAL
ability_description.SUPER_FANG: Deals [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL. Double damage on GRASS pokémon
ability_description.TEETER_DANCE: All other Pokémon are CONFUSION for 3 seconds, allies and enemies alike
ability_description.CLOSE_COMBAT: Deals [130,SP] SPECIAL and reduce the caster DEF and SPE_DEF by 2
ability_description.AQUA_RING: Dives into the middle of the allied team, creating an aquatic ring that heals [20,30,50,SP] HP
ability_description.POISON_GAS: A cloud of stinky gas is thrown in the face of all adjacent enemies, inflicting [15,30,60,SP] SPECIAL, POISON and PARALYSIS for 3 seconds
ability_description.ASSIST: Copy and cast an ability from an allied pokémon chosen at random
ability_description.FISSURE: Open [2,3,4] rifts. Each rift deals [25,50,75,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.ASSURANCE: Deals [25,50,100,SP] SPECIAL. Doubles if the caster in under 50% HP
ability_description.BRAVE_BIRD: Flies away with its target dealing [30,60,90,SP] SPECIAL
ability_description.MAGICAL_LEAF: The user scatters curious leaves that chase the furthest target, inflicting [10,20,40,SP] and ARMOR_REDUCTION for 3 seconds on anything in its path
ability_description.STEALTH_ROCKS: Lays sharp stones around, dealing [50,SP] SPECIAL. The stones stay on field, dealing 10 PHYSICAL per second and WOUND opponents that walk on it, if not ROCK or FLYING.
ability_description.TAIL_GLOW: Deals [30,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies and increase AP by 50%
ability_description.STRUGGLE_BUG: Deals [30,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies and reduce their AP by 50%
ability_description.PRISMATIC_LASER: The user shoots a prismatic laser in a large straight line, dealing [80,SP] and displacing any enemies it hits.
ability_description.NATURAL_GIFT: Heals [30,60,120,SP] HP to the most injured ally and RUNE_PROTECT for [1,2,3] s
ability_description.NIGHT_SHADE: Deals [25,33,50,SP=0.5]% of target max HP as TRUE
ability_description.CHARGE_BEAM: Fires a concentrated bundle of electricity that propagate to max 3 adjacent targets, dealing [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL to each. The remaining electricity increase AP by 20%.
ability_description.POPULATION_BOMB: Deals [10,SP] times 10 SPECIAL to the target

effect_description.VICTORY_STAR: 40% chance to BURN, +1 ATK after every hit
effect_description.DROUGHT: 50% chance to BURN, +2 ATK after every hit
effect_description.DESOLATE_LAND: 100% chance to BURN, +3 ATK after every hit
effect_description.RAIN_DANCE: 30% chance to dodge. Fish a pokemon after every PvP fight.
effect_description.DRIZZLE: 45% chance to dodge. Rare pokemons can be fished.
effect_description.PRIMORDIAL_SEA: 60% chance to dodge. Epic pokemons can be fished.
effect_description.RISING_VOLTAGE: Every fourth attack is a triple attack
effect_description.OVERDRIVE: Every third attack is a triple attack
effect_description.LIGHT_SCREEN: +100% AP. Unowns have 5% chance to appear in shop.
effect_description.EERIE_SPELL: +150% AP. After a fight, get an Unown shop.
effect_description.IRON_DEFENSE: One of your STEEL Pokemon gains double base ATK
effect_description.AUTOMATE: All of your STEEL Pokemon gains double base ATK
effect_description.STEEL_SURGE: All of your STEEL Pokemon gains double base ATK. One gets triple base ATK
effect_description.VENOMOUS: 50% chance to POISON. Max stacks of POISON +1
effect_description.TOXIC: 70% chance to POISON. Max stacks of POISON +2
effect_description.DRAGON_ENERGY: Dragon's second synergy counts double (not the third)
effect_description.DRAGON_DANCE: Dragons gain 10% ATK_SPEED and 10% AP per tier
effect_description.PURSUIT: When knocking down its target, gain 3 ATK and 30 max HP
effect_description.BRUTAL_SWING: When knocking down its target, gain 6 ATK and 60 max HP
effect_description.POWER_TRIP: When knocking down its target, gain 9 ATK and 90 max HP
effect_description.MEDITATE: Heal for 10% HP of the damage
effect_description.FOCUS_ENERGY: Heal for 25% HP of the damage
effect_description.CALM_MIND: Heal for 50% HP of the damage
effect_description.SWIFT_SWIM: 35% chance to burn 20 PP and return 15 PP to the attacker
effect_description.HYDRATION: 45% chance to burn 20 PP and return 30 PP to the attacker
effect_description.WATER_VEIL: 55% chance to burn 20 PP and return 45 PP to the attacker
effect_description.FEATHER_DANCE: Get PROTECT for 1.5 seconds after flying away
effect_description.MAX_AIRSTREAM: Fly away twice when under 50% HP and 20% HP
effect_description.MAX_GUARD: When flying away, enemies around are PARALYSIS for 2 seconds
effect_description.MOON_FORCE: Shocks deal 80 SPECIAL. All the opponent team is CHARM for 2 seconds at the start of the fight.
effect_description.ALLEGRO: Ally team gains +1 ATK and +5% ATK_SPEED
effect_description.PRESTO: Ally team gains +1 ATK, +5% ATK_SPEED and 3 PP
effect_description.DUBIOUS_DISC: Gain +10% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item
effect_description.LINK_CABLE: Gain +20% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item
effect_description.GOOGLE_SPECS: Gain +30% base ATK, AP  and max HP as SHIELD per held item
effect_description.HATCHER: 20% chance per consecutive defeat to get an Egg
effect_description.BREEDER: Get an Egg after each defeat against a player
effect_description.TELEPORT_NEXT_ATTACK: Next attack will deal additional SPECIAL
effect_description.SANDSTORM:
5 SPECIAL per second (GROUND are immune)
+30% CONFUSION duration
effect_description.RAIN:
+3 PP per second
-30% BURN and POISON damage
effect_description.STORM:
Lightning randomly falls on the board (ELECTRIC are immune)
+30% PARALYSIS duration
effect_description.HYDRATATION: GRASS synergy is healing 5 additional HP per second under the RAIN
effect_description.ETERNAL_LIGHT: Also increase AP and ATK by 30%

item_description.FOSSIL_STONE: A fossil of a Pokémon that lived in prehistoric times
item_description.OLD_AMBER: The holder gains the FOSSIL type
item_description.DAWN_STONE: The holder gains the PSYCHIC type
item_description.WATER_STONE: The holder gains the WATER type
item_description.THUNDER_STONE: The holder gains the ELECTRIC type
item_description.FIRE_STONE: The holder gains the FIRE type
item_description.MOON_STONE: The holder gains the FAIRY type
item_description.DUSK_STONE: The holder gains the DARK type
item_description.LEAF_STONE: The holder gains the GRASS type
item_description.ICE_STONE: The holder gains the ICE type
item_description.SOUL_DEW: During combat, the holder gains 8% AP every second
item_description.UPGRADE: Successful attacks grant +4% bonus ATK_SPEED for the rest of combat
item_description.REAPER_CLOTH: The holder spells can critically strike
item_description.POKEMONOMICON: When the holder deals SPECIAL, they BURN and WOUND the target for 3 seconds
item_description.POWER_LENS: 50% of incoming SPECIAL is also dealt to the attacker
item_description.SHELL_BELL: Holder heals for 33% of all damages inflicted
item_description.LUCKY_EGG: +40% AP for holder and adjacent allies in the same row
item_description.AQUA_EGG: The holder gains +50 starting PP and regains 20 PP after casting its ability
item_description.BLUE_ORB: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 2 enemies, burning 20 PP
item_description.SCOPE_LENS: Gains 25% CRIT_CHANCE. Critical hits steal 15 PP from the target.
item_description.STAR_DUST: After casting ability, gain 60% of max PP as SHIELD
item_description.DELTA_ORB: Holder and adjacent allies in the same row gain 4 bonus PP per hit
item_description.MANA_SCARF: The holder attacks restore 8 additional PP
item_description.SMOKE_BALL: Enemies attacking the holder are PARALYSIS for 5 seconds, reducing their ATK_SPEED by 40%
item_description.XRAY_VISION: +50% ATK_SPEED. The holder attacks can no longer miss.
item_description.RAZOR_FANG: +100% CRIT_DAMAGE. Critical hits apply ARMOR_REDUCTION for 4 seconds.
item_description.LEFTOVERS: During the combat, the holder attack heals adjacent allies on the same row for 5% of their max HP
item_description.CHOICE_SCARF: On hit deal 50% basic attack damage to an adjacent enemy
item_description.FIRE_GEM: Attacks do double damage on SHIELD and deal 8 % of target max HP as additional damage
item_description.DEFENSIVE_RIBBON: When the holder takes damage, gain 1 stack. Every 2 stacks, the holder gains +1 DEF, +1 ATK and +5% ATK_SPEED (max 20 stacks)
item_description.WONDER_BOX: At the beginning of each battle, WONDER_BOX is replaced by 2 temporary items (max 3 items held)
item_description.CLEANSE_TAG: When combat begins, the holder and all adjacent allies on the same row receive 25% HP as SHIELD and RUNE_PROTECT for 6 seconds
item_description.FLUFFY_TAIL: Holder is immune to all status alterations
item_description.SHINY_CHARM: Prevents damage and give PROTECT for 2 seconds the first time the holders gets below 30% HP
item_description.GRACIDEA_FLOWER: When combat begins, the holder and adjacent allies in the same row gain +25 % ATK_SPEED
item_description.FLAME_ORB: Holder is burned but increase its ATK by 100%
item_description.ASSAULT_VEST: +20 SPE_DEF. Reduce BURN and POISON damage by 50%
item_description.AMULET_COIN: +1 gold each time the holder knocks down an opponent
item_description.RED_ORB: +10 ATK. 25% of attack damage is dealt as TRUE
item_description.MAX_REVIVE: Give RESURECTION, preventing the holder first KO and restoring to max HP
item_description.ROCKY_HELMET: +12 DEF. Negates critical bonus damage from incoming critical hits.
item_description.AGUAV_BERRY: Once below 50% HP, restore to max HP and get CONFUSION for 3 seconds
item_description.ASPEAR_BERRY: Consumed when being FREEZE for the first time, giving immunity to FREEZE for the rest of the fight
item_description.BABIRI_BERRY: Once receiving a critical hit, heal 20 HP and gain PROTECT for 2 seconds
item_description.CHERI_BERRY: Consumed when being PARALYSIS for the first time, giving immunity to PARALYSIS for the rest of the fight
item_description.CHESTO_BERRY: Consumed when being SLEEP for the first time, giving immunity to SLEEP for the rest of the fight
item_description.JABOCA_BERRY: Once below 50% HP, cast $t(ability.SPIKE_ARMOR) for 10 seconds
item_description.LEPPA_BERRY: After casting ability, gain 50 PP once
item_description.LUM_BERRY: Once health is below 50%, clear negative status and get RUNE_PROTECT for 10 seconds
item_description.ORAN_BERRY: Once health is below 50%, gain 100 SHIELD
item_description.PECHA_BERRY: Consumed when being POISON for the first time, giving immunity to POISON for the rest of the fight
item_description.PERSIM_BERRY: Consumed when being CONFUSION for the first time, giving immunity to CONFUSION for the rest of the fight
item_description.RAWST_BERRY: Consumed when being BURN for the first time, giving immunity to BURN for the rest of the fight
item_description.ROWAP_BERRY: Once below 50% HP, cast $t(ability.MAGIC_BOUNCE) for 10 seconds
item_description.SITRUS_BERRY: Once below 50% HP, heal 30 HP and increase all healing received by 50%

passive_description.TYROGUE:
Will choose a combat discipline based on the first item given:
CHARCOAL MAGNET: $t(pkm.HITMONLEE)
HEART_SCALE NEVER_MELT_ICE: $t(pkm.HITMONCHAN)
Others: $t(pkm.HITMONTOP)
passive_description.PROTEAN2: The pokemon acquires the typing of the 2 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.PROTEAN3: The pokemon acquires the typing of the 3 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.CASTFORM: Castform changes its form and the weather to SUN, RAIN or SNOW depending on your dominant synergy between FIRE WATER ICE
passive_description.PHIONE: Phione is looking for an AQUA_EGG
passive_description.PRIMAL: Legend has it that you could unleash the ancient powers of these pokemons
passive_description.WONDER_GUARD: Reduce received damage and received healing to 1
passive_description.ELECTRIC_SURGE: Give ELECTRIC_FIELD to your ELECTRIC Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.GRASSY_SURGE: Give GRASS_FIELD to your GRASS Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.MISTY_SURGE: Give FAIRY_FIELD to your FAIRY Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.PSYCHIC_SURGE: Give PSYCHIC_FIELD to your Psychic Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.EEVEE: Eevee can evolve into one of the 8 Eeveelutions when given a synergy stone
passive_description.SUDOWOODO:
Pretends to be a tree and does not attack but gain 2 ATK per second instead (stackable).
Starts attacking when PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.WOBBUFFET: Does not move or attack until PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.DITTO: Ditto can't fight, but it can transform to create a copy of the basic form of one of your pokemons you drop it over (except Uniques and Hatch)
passive_description.EGG: You can feel something moving inside
passive_description.HATCH: Hatched pokemons evolve automatically after 4 stages
passive_description.SYNCHRO: If the pokemon is affected by POISON, BURN, WOUND or SILENCE, the enemy caster will suffer the same negative status
passive_description.TADPOLE: Poliwhirl will evolve into Poliwrath if placed on the frontlane, Politoed otherwise
passive_description.BIVALVE: Clamperl will evolve into Huntail if placed on the frontlane, Gorebyss otherwise
passive_description.AIRLOCK: Neutralize weather effects, getting back to NEUTRAL
passive_description.WURMPLE:
Wurmple evolves depending on the weather at the previous stage:
Cascoon: NIGHT, STORM, SANDSTORM, SNOW
Silcoon: SUN, RAIN, MISTY, WINDY
Random if NEUTRAL
passive_description.HYDRATATION: GRASS synergy is healing 5 additional HP per second under the RAIN
passive_description.SHARED_VISION: Shared vision: all Pokemon with shared vision will attack the same target, if at range
passive_description.WATER_SPRING: Whenever an enemy uses their ability, gain 5 PP
passive_description.GIRATINA: Giratina switches between its Altered Forme and Origin Forme depending on its position on the board
passive_description.UNOWN: Unown cannot hold items and vanish after one fight or after casting their ability
passive_description.GLIGAR: Gligar is looking for a RAZOR_FANG. If the Pokémon is POISON, it will gain HP instead of taking damage
passive_description.POISON_HEAL: If the Pokémon is POISON, it will gain HP instead of taking damage
passive_description.GRIM_NEIGH: When the Pokémon knocks out an enemy, it emits a terrifying whinny sound that increases its AP by 30
passive_description.SHAYMIN: Shaymin is looking for a GRACIDEA_FLOWER
passive_description.BEAST_BOOST: Upon kill, the pokémon gains 5 ATK
passive_description.CHINGLING: Chingling is looking for a STAR_DUST
passive_description.CHIMECHO: Resonates to sounds from allies, which doubles SOUND synergy bonus while Chimecho is alive
passive_description.RAICHU: Raichu is looking for a DAWN_STONE
passive_description.SURGE_SURFER: The surge surfer gets +30% ATK_SPEED in ELECTRIC_FIELD or PSYCHIC_FIELD
passive_description.MEGA_LAUNCHER: This pokémon ability emits 3 SOUND cries instead of one
passive_description.DRY_SKIN: Heals 8 HP per second under RAIN. Gains 25% dodge chance under SANDSTORM. Gains 50% AP under SUN
passive_description.SPOT_PANDA: The pokémon is immune to CONFUSION and deals [100,SP]% additional SPECIAL to pokemons with CONFUSION
passive_description.CUBONE: Marowak is looking for a FIRE_STONE
passive_description.GUTS: The pokémon gains 5 ATK as long as it is BURN or POISON
passive_description.STENCH: Leaves behind a stinking cloud that POISON any unit that breathes it
passive_description.PORYGON: Porygon2 is looking for an UPGRADE
passive_description.SLOWBRO: Slowbro is looking for a KINGS_ROCK
passive_description.MOXIE: Every time an enemy pokémon dies, it gains ATK equal to its stars
passive_description.BELLSPROUT: Weepinbell is looking for a LEAF_STONE
passive_description.CLEFAIRY: Clefairy is looking for a MOON_STONE
passive_description.ILLUMISE_VOLBEAT: Illumise and Volbeat gain 5 PP per second for each other member of their species alive on the board
passive_description.PRISM: Necrozma switches between its Ultra forme and Normal forme depending on its exposure to LIGHT
passive_description.BLOSSOM: Cherrim switches between its Sunlight forme and Normal forme depending on its exposure to LIGHT
passive_description.GENESECT: Genesect is dealing TRUE to targets affected by ARMOR_REDUCTION
passive_description.SPECIAL_ATTACK: Basic attacks deal SPECIAL and scale with AP
passive_description.NINCADA: After evolving, get Sheninja as well if you have a free space on your bench
passive_description.FAMILY: The pokémon grows with time (turn 15 and turn 20)

stat_description.ATK: Damage inflicted on each basic attack
stat_description.ATK_SPEED: Number of attacks per second. Maximum 2.5.
stat_description.CRIT_CHANCE: Critical hits deal 2x more damage. Abilities cannot crit by default.
stat_description.CRIT_DAMAGE: Multiplier for critical hits additional damage
stat_description.HP: Pokémon is knocked out when it no longer has Health Points
stat_description.MAX_PP: Amount of PP required to cast ability. Pokemons receive PP over time (10 per second), when attacking (5 per attack) and when receiving damage (10% of incoming damage)
stat_description.AP: Increase SPECIAL and ability effects in various ways.
stat_description.SHIELD: Temporary health points, cannot be healed.

status_description.BURN: Deals 5% of max HP as TRUE every second
status_description.SILENCE: Prevents casting abilities and gaining PP
status_description.POISON: Deals 5% of max HP per stack as TRUE every second. Can stack up to 3 times by default. Reduce healing by 20% per stack.
status_description.PROTECT: Protects from any source of damage, but prevents PP gain
status_description.SLEEP: Prevents moving, dodging or attacking. Receiving attacks reduces the duration of the effect.
status_description.CONFUSION: Force to change target all the time and sometimes deal damage to itself
status_description.RESURECTION: Prevents KO once, restoring to max HP
status_description.PARALYSIS: Reduce ATK_SPEED by 40% and prevents dodging attacks
status_description.CHARM: Prevents attacking the target and forces to get closer to it

synergy_description.NORMAL: NORMAL pokemons and their adjacent allies gain SHIELD when combat starts
synergy_description.GRASS: GRASS pokemons heal and produce berries over time
synergy_description.FIRE: FIRE pokemons gain ATK after every hit and have a chance to BURN their enemies for 2 seconds
synergy_description.WATER: WATER pokemons have a chance to dodge basic attacks. A new WATER pokemon is fished after each PvP turn and put on your bench.
synergy_description.ELECTRIC: ELECTRIC pokemons basic attacks can trigger two additional attacks
synergy_description.FIGHTING: FIGHTING pokemons block a flat amount of damage on every hit received
synergy_description.PSYCHIC: PSYCHIC pokemons gain additional AP and attract Unowns
synergy_description.DARK: DARK pokemons critical hits are more powerful and more frequent. Melee Dark pokemons jump to the farthest target reachable.
synergy_description.STEEL: STEEL pokemons can multiply their base ATK
synergy_description.GROUND: GROUND pokemons gain bonus ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF every 3 seconds, up to 5 times.
synergy_description.POISON: POISON pokemons have a chance to POISON their target for 4 seconds with their basic attacks. Poison inflicts TRUE over time and reduce healing efficiency.
synergy_description.DRAGON: DRAGON amplify synergies and gains more stats when fully evolved.
synergy_description.FIELD: When a FIELD pokemon dies, all the other FIELD pokemons are healed and gain ATK_SPEED
synergy_description.MONSTER: MONSTER pokemons gain Attack, heal and increase their max HP, and grow in size every time they knock down an opponent
synergy_description.HUMAN: All your team heals for a percentage of the damage they deal with attacks and abilities
synergy_description.AQUATIC: AQUATIC pokemons have a chance to steal PP from their target at every basic attack
synergy_description.BUG: At the start of the combat, the BUG pokemons with the most HP are duplicated
synergy_description.FLYING: FLYING pokemons fly away when they fell under a certain amount of HP
synergy_description.FLORA: When the first FLORA pokemon is dead, a flower will rise from its grave...
synergy_description.ROCK: ROCK pokemons gain DEF and better resist to critical damage
synergy_description.GHOST: GHOST pokemons have 50% chance to SILENCE on hit, and deal a percentage of their damage as TRUE
synergy_description.FAIRY: Whenever FAIRY pokemons deal or receive a critical hit, they receive a shock if at melee range, or are CHARM for 2 seconds if not at range
synergy_description.ICE: All allies gain SPE_DEF and have a chance to FREEZE the enemy for 2 seconds after a hit
synergy_description.FOSSIL: On their first KO, FOSSIL pokemons come back to life with increased ATK
synergy_description.SOUND: SOUND pokemons emit a cry when they use their abilities, waking up allies asleep and giving them bonus stats
synergy_description.ARTIFICIAL: ARTIFICIAL pokemons gains ATK and SHIELD depending on the number of items held
synergy_description.BABY: BABY can bring you Pokemon Eggs to comfort you after a defeat
synergy_description.LIGHT: Light reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses.

+3 PP per second
-30% BURN and POISON damage

faq.official_game_answer: No, this is a fan game; made by fans, for fans. All rights/credits to Pokemon Company.
faq.how_pokemon_evolve_answer: You need 3 copies of the same pokemon to get the evolution. The 3 pokemons will merge to give the evolved pokemon. Hatch Pokemon that come from eggs evolve automatically with time every 5 stages.
faq.income_answer: You get 5 gold per round whether you draw, win or lose. You get 1 bonus income per 10 gold saved. A maximum of 5 bonus income accrued at 50 saved gold. You get 1 bonus gold if you win. If you win multiple times, you will also gain extra gold; one bonus gold for every victory/defeat, up to 5 bonus gold for 5 streak wins / 5 streak defeat. Wins/Defeats against PVE are not taken into account.
faq.collection: What is the purpose of the collection/booster ?
faq.collection_answer: When opening boosters, you get pokemon shards. Those shards are specific to every pokemon. In the collection tab, you can buy pokemon emotions with those shards. You can see pokemon emotions as a detailed customization. When selecting an emotion pokemon portrait, the pokemon will appear everywhere with the same emotion portrait that you have selected. Eveyone will see the emotion that you picked for this pokemon. Moreover, if you have selected a shiny emotion, the pokemon will appear shiny to everyone else.
faq.avatars: How do I get new avatars ?
faq.avatars_answer: When buying a pokemon emotion, it will be available in your profile avatar list.
faq.boosters_answer: You gain boosters each time you level up.
faq.level_answer: You gain experience each time you finish a game. If you finish first, you'll get 700 xp, if you finish last, you'll get 100 xp.
faq.sprite: It seems some sprites are missing ?
faq.sprite_answer2: If you want the missing sprites to be added, please consider donating to pokemon autochess. Every donation will be used to pay spriters to make sprites for everyone.
faq.sprite_answer1: Sprites of pokemon auto chess are based on
faq.mythical: How do I get unique / legendary pokemons ?
faq.mythical_answer: At turn 10 and 20, portals will appear with synergy symbols on them. Enter one of them to be proposed a set of unique, strong pokemons of the matching synergies. You'll be able to pick one of them.
faq.ditto_answer: Ditto creates a plain copy of the unit you hover and drop it over. Ditto can't fight. Each pokemon in shop has a 0.5% chance to be a Ditto at every roll. You can't copy mythical pokemons.
faq.items_answer: After winning a PVE round, you will get a random basic item and you will be able to choose from 3 choices another basic item that suits you. You can combine two basic items to create a powerful tier 2 item. Every pokemon can hold up to 3 items. The crafting list of all items is available in the wiki, in the items section.
faq.bots_answer: Bots are created by other players. Bots are theme-based, a mewtwo bot will always have an mewtwo in its team at a certain time in the game. Bots have a list of predefined teams at each stage.
faq.create_bot: Can i create my own bot ?
faq.create_bot_answer: Sure. You'll need to be at least level 20 to unlock the Bot Builder gadget. You can use it to create and submit your bot, it will be sent in the #bot-creation channel on Discord for a review by the bot reviewers team.
faq.elo: How does the elo system work ?
faq.elo_answer: The elo system in Pokemon Auto Chess works the same as in other elo based games like Chess, Lol, Starcraft etc... To gain elo points, you need to beat other players. The higher your opponent's elo, the more elo you will gain by defeating him, and vice versa. If you don't play for 10 days, your elo will start to decay (-10 elo/day).
faq.missing_points: I didn't get elo points in my last game, why ?
faq.missing_points_answer: The game needs to be finished in order to win/lose elo points. If someone is still in game, you need to wait. Bots do not give elo, only human players are accounted for elo rating. It is also possible that the game had elo disabled ("Just for fun" mode)
faq.damage_label: What are the special damages and physical damages ?
faq.damage_answer: Auto attacks mostly deal Physical damage, while Abilities mostly deal Special damage. Some abilities however can deal true damage or physical damage.
faq.defense: Can you tell me how defense works? Is it flat damage reduction?
faq.defense_answer: Same system as League of Legends: damage: atk * (hp / hp * (1+(0.1*def))). Defense works for physical damage, special defense for special damage
faq.shiny: How do you get shiny pokemons ?
faq.shiny_answer: You get experience points by playing games. With enough experience, you level up and get a booster pack. Each booster pack gives shards for random pokemon. Use these shards to purchase the shiny emotes of a pokemon in the Collection page, then you will get that one pokemon as a shiny ingame.
faq.support: How can i support the game ?
faq.mobile: Will there be a mobile version one day ?
faq.code: What language/library is used to code the game ?
faq.code_answer: TypeScript, Phaser, Colyseus. If you want to contribute
faq.damage: What are the special damages and physical damages ?

tutorial.friends: How to make a lobby with friends ?

mobile_warning: This game is not adapted for mobile, play it on desktop
nintendo_warning: Non profit, open source. All rights to The Pokemon Company®
copyright: All rights to The Pokemon Company®
click_on_create_room: Click on Create Room to play!
boosters_hint: Play more games to level up and earn new boosters.
open_boosters_hint: Open boosters to unlock new avatars and complete your collection !
export_hint: You can export your current work by copy pasting the following data.   You can then import the bot data later.
bot_ready_submission: If you think that your bot is ready, you can submit your bot to the   discord community. Your bot will be reviewed in the discord channel   #bot-creation.
get_started_bot: Get started with an existing BOT or paste your own BOT data
help_create_bot: To create a bot, you need to fill a certain number of steps.   Each step represents the state of your bot at a moment in the game   The bot will start with the team defined on step 1. Then, it will go   to step 2 and so on   The team of the step 2 should always be stronger than the step 1   team   As the player cannot get more than 10 pokemons/step, your bot is not   allowed too.
author: Author
points_required_hint: Points required represent how much your bot needs to work to get to the next step
next_step_hint: Once your bot has acquired enough points, it will go to the next step
victory_step_hint: For a victory, your bot will get 1.5 point
defeat_step_hint: For a defeat or a draw, your bot will get 1 point
step_bot_hint: The more points you require, the longer the bot will stay on this step
additional_pokemon_hint: Each player picked two additional Pokemon to be available in all   players shop for this game.
lose_game_hint: You lose the game when you have no more Health Points
players_disconnected_hint: Players disconnected for more than 3 minutes are kicked out of the game. Game will start after 5 minutes max of loading no matter what.
passive_income_hint: Each stage, gain 5 gold + 1 extra gold if you won the previous battle.
victory_income_hint: Gain 1 bonus gold for every victory or defeat streak, up to 5 bonus gold.
additional_income_hint: Gain 1 bonus gold per 10 gold saved, up to 5 bonus income at 50 saved gold.
show_details_on_hover: Show details on hover instead of right click
pick_additional_pokemon_hint: Pick an additional Pokemon. It will be available to everyone.
free_slot_hint: You must have one free slot on the bench, or two for Duos
increase_level_hint: Increase your level to raise your chances to get higher tier Pokémon.
team_size_hint: Increase your team size by leveling up
name: Name
anonymous_users_name_hint: Anonymous users cannot change their name.
enter_password: Enter a password for the room
just_for_fun_hint: This game is just for fun, no ELO gain/loss !
elligible_elo_hint: ✔ This game is elligible for ELO gain/loss.
not_elligible_elo_hint: ❌Games with bots only are not elligible for ELO gain/loss.
add_bot_or_wait_hint: Add bots or wait for more players to join your room
tutorial_work: for his work on tutorial videos !
weather_dominant_hint: The dominant type of pokemons on the board during a battle can influence the weather. The weather has various effects on all of your team's and opponent's pokemons.
weather_dominant_hint2: It will require at least 8 pokemons of this type on the board to change the weather. Some powerful pokemons also have the ability to change weather by their own.
play_more_games_hint: Play more games to earn boosters and unlock new avatars !
community_translations:
Translations are managed by the community. If you want to add or
              help improve a translation, head over to
loading_complete: Loading complete, waiting for other players...
game-reconnect-modal-body: You left a game in progress. Do you want to reconnect to your previous game ?

gadget.trainer_card_desc: Let you change your name, avatar and title
gadget.bag_desc: Used to store your collection and boosters cards
gadget.bot_builder_desc: Create your own bots and submit them to have a chance to be included in the game
gadget.map_desc: Choose the map before game as room leader

select_map: Select the map for this game
